body.p: “At Bittern Cliff spring- a handsomely cut petalled geranium- the whole rather elliptical in outline forget the number of petals. The panicled cornel by Conants orchard wall will open in a day or 2 prob. 14 well out the 16 elsewhere. The small veronica with minute blue flowers at Lee’s cliff- how long. V. arvensis Pennyroyal is 4 or 5 inches high there.”
